dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.
dependencies.name: py-click

dependencies.description: Colored terminal output for Python's logging module
dependencies.name: py-coloredlogs

dependencies.description:
This modest package contains various common humanization utilities, like
turning a number into a fuzzy human readable duration ('3 minutes ago')
or into a human readable size or throughput. It works with python 2.7
and 3.3 and is localized to Russian, French, Korean and Slovak.
dependencies.name: py-humanize

dependencies.description: Read metadata from Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-importlib-metadata

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description:
Static image export for web-based visualization libraries with zero
dependencies
dependencies.name: py-kaleido

dependencies.description:
This is a Python implementation of John Gruber's Markdown. It is almost
completely compliant with the reference implementation, though there are
a few very minor differences. See John's Syntax Documentation for the
syntax rules.
dependencies.name: py-markdown

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-packaging

dependencies.description:
Pillow is a fork of the Python Imaging Library (PIL). It adds image
processing capabilities to your Python interpreter. This library
supports many file formats, and provides powerful image processing and
graphics capabilities.
dependencies.name: py-pillow

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python
dependencies.name: py-plotly

dependencies.description: Provides yaml file parsing with environment variable resolution
dependencies.name: py-pyaml-env

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyyaml

dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.
dependencies.name: py-requests

dependencies.description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the
terminal.
dependencies.name: py-rich

dependencies.description:
The intention of rich-click is to provide attractive help output from
click, formatted with rich, with minimal customisation required.
dependencies.name: py-rich-click

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Color scales and color conversion made easy for Python.
dependencies.name: py-spectra

dependencies.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter
dependencies.name: py-tqdm

dependencies.description: Run-time type checker for Python.
dependencies.name: py-typeguard

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
MultiQC is a tool to aggregate bioinformatics results across many
samples into a single report. It is written in Python and contains
modules for a large number of common bioinformatics tools.
name: py-multiqc

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
